title: Home
description: Tina is a content management platform, with a content management API and frontend toolkit to rapidly prototype your own CMS.

blocks.headline: Content editing for modern teams
blocks.subline: Tina is an open-source CMS admin that talks to any API

blocks.headline: Edit content, in the context of your site
blocks.subline: Just click on the page and type. Contextual toolbars and panels appear at just the right times to create the content you want.

valueItems.headline: Page building
valueItems.subline: Pick from your custom predefined components to build web experiences, blazing fast

valueItems.headline: Design Systems
valueItems.subline: Build pages with YOUR design system. Maximize reusability.

blocks.headline: Build with your components
blocks.subline: Let your team build great layouts with your own React components.

blocks.headline: Avoid Vendor Lock-In
blocks.subline: Add visual editing to your site for logged in users.

items.headline: Tina comes with editing.
